Uses of Package
io.atomix.storage.journal

  • Packages that use io.atomix.storage.journal 
    Package Description
    io.atomix.protocols.raft.storage.log
    Provides a standalone segmented log for use in the Raft consensus protocol implementation.
    io.atomix.storage.journal
    Provides a low-level journal abstraction for appending to logs and managing segmented logs.
  • Classes in io.atomix.storage.journal used by io.atomix.protocols.raft.storage.log 
    Class and Description
    DelegatingJournal
    Delegating journal.

    DelegatingJournalWriter
    Journal writer delegate.
